backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue nodes, activities, moments, letters, and save data with functions to start and continue games.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-written summaries of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed Internet Computer deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational instructions for maintaining canister availability and addressing offline errors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling startup, navigation, backend checks, and game launch handling with diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Config for simple username-based admin access and its associated storage key.
Defines activity types and a list of in-game activities with trust effects and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand-based audio manager that handles volume, mute state, and background music playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: React Three Fiber component rendering Puro with idle animation and click/hover interactions to trigger dialogue.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Mobile touch control overlay providing joystick movement, look controls, and jump handling, disabled when paused or terminal open.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look inputs into movement and look vectors while respecting pause and terminal states.
Zustand store managing joystick values, look deltas, one-shot jump requests, and control resets.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Lists customization items with descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Defines dialogue nodes and branching choices with trust effects and optional requirements for the game's conversation system.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game container that initializes state, mounts the 3D canvas, plays music, and displays UI panels and overlays based on game state.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Contains preset response arrays and a function that returns a contextual reply based on keywords in a letter.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a drag-and-sort style book categorization game that adjusts trust based on accuracy and completion.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Provides a gallery-like viewer for Puro’s drawings, increasing trust as the player views all items.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: Implements a timed hide‑and‑seek guessing game with trust rewards or penalties depending on performance.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launches mini‑games from a menu and handles switching and closing logic.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title, scene text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data entries with titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/HiveScene.tsx: Renders a 3D hive area with player movement, jumping physics, and procedural tree placement.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library scene, handling player movement, jumping, camera controls, texture loading, and proximity-based teleport triggers with Puro.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines the global game store with persistent state for trust, progress, scenes, UI panels, and actions to update gameplay variables.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data and provides a helper to select an ending based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending screen based on trust level and allows starting a new game or returning to the title screen.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Shows available activities, applies trust and completion effects, unlocks moments, and closes after selection.
Lets players place discovered customization items in the library and view placed items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Displays dialogue nodes, filters choices by trust, updates trust and dialogue state, and handles closing the panel.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: UI panel for writing letters, sending them, and viewing generated responses using game store state.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays unlockable story moments and plays selected moments, with locked states handled via game store.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause menu providing navigation to activities, settings, letters, moments, and reset options, with admin terminal support.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides audio settings UI including mute toggle and volume slider, with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows current trust level with a labeled progress bar and color indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health via actor.isAvailable and exposes status, errors, and refetch controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for game state, actions, and progress updates with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Startup module handling one-time initialization, asset preloading, storage checks, and reset utilities.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store providing a local-only admin gate with username-based unlock and persistence.
Empty placeholder file for server access store logic.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for unlocking and locking local admin mode with validation and feedback messages.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Credits and about screen with game info, feature list, branding link, and a return button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin-only diagnostic terminal overlay supporting commands, output logging, keyboard shortcuts, and store integration.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: UI component that displays game launch errors with user-friendly summaries and optional technical details.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors during gameplay and shows a styled error screen with optional stack details.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Small status widget that shows backend server health as an online/offline/checking indicator.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements terminal command parsing and execution for help, clearing output, diagnostics, and server status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into readable terminal lines for display.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal state, output lines, and input/output logging.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title menu UI with game start actions, server status indicators, admin controls, and offline notices.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Utility that converts raw launch errors into normalized categories and user-friendly summaries.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation describing the app startup flow, initialization tasks, and extension instructions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining metadata, existing features, and a pending feature request related to mobile look controls.
